title: Ghum Hai Kisi Ke Pyaar Mein
overview: A young police officer loved a woman, promising to marry her. But the word given to the deceased boss connects his fate with the daughter of the deceased man. Duty obliges a guy to obey his conscience, and he marries a young lady, although he feels feelings for his beloved. A valiant policeman is obliged to forget about his love, so as not to destroy his forced marriage. A spouse has to live with a man whose heart is occupied with another woman. But the girl tries to get used to the flow of her new life and does everything to earn the respect of her husband.Past promises made to a beloved girl torment the soul of a policeman, but he could not do otherwise. Every day, the couple gets used to a new life, where there are no mutual feelings. But gradually, the wife falls in love with her own husband, and realizes that she is ready to earn his love, despite the rival who is deeply embedded in his heart. Soon the faithful begins to realize that the old feelings for the beloved begin to evaporate, and a strong attraction to his wife makes it clear,
